name: Michael Chang
interest: Startup Founder & CTO with 15+ years experience building technical products from 0 to 1

education.description: Focus on entrepreneurship and software systems

jobs.description: Built SaaS platform from scratch to $10M ARR with 100+ enterprise customers and 30-person engineering team

projects.title: MVP to Product-Market Fit
projects.description: Led technical strategy from prototype to scalable platform serving 500K+ users

insights.description: Achieved product-market fit in 18 months through rapid iteration
Raised $15M Series A led by top-tier VCs
Built engineering team from 2 to 30 engineers across 5 teams
Architected platform handling 10M+ API requests daily with 99.9% uptime

jobs.description: Led infrastructure team supporting billions of users

insights.description: Scaled systems to handle 10x growth in 3 years
Product vision: Built 0-to-1 products, raised venture funding, and scaled engineering organizations. Strong technical depth with business acumen
Technical requirement for startups: Architecture must support 100x growth with minimal refactoring. Prioritize speed-to-market over perfect architecture in early stages
